text: Matthew Paul Clement (born August 12, 1974, in Butler, Pennsylvania) is a former Major League Baseball starting pitcher. Clement played for the San Diego Padres, Florida Marlins, Chicago Cubs and Boston Red Sox. While on the Red Sox active roster, he was injured all of the 2007 season. He batted and threw right-handed. On April 5, 2009, Clement said he was no longer going to play baseball. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:San Diego Padres players Category:Florida Marlins players Category:Chicago Cubs players Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:Sportspeople from Pennsylvania
title: Matt Clement
